com.vmware.vapi.cis.authn

Class SamlTokenSecurityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.cis.authn.SamlTokenSecurityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.core.ExecutionContext.SecurityContext

    public final class SamlTokenSecurityContext
extends Object
implements com.vmware.vapi.core.ExecutionContext.SecurityContext
    This class represents the security context needed for authentication using SAML tokens.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SamlTokenSecurityContext

        public SamlTokenSecurityContext(com.vmware.vapi.saml.SamlToken token,
                                PrivateKey privateKey)
        Parameters:
        token - cannot be null. will be serialized as part of the signature
        privateKey - if null request payload signature will not be generated. The private key will NOT be serialized in the request.

      • SamlTokenSecurityContext

        public SamlTokenSecurityContext(String token,
                                PrivateKey privateKey)
        Creates a SAML token security context from text. The text will be embedded in the request and will not be checked if it represents valid SAML token with suitable attributes.
        Parameters:
        token - cannot be null. will be serialized as part of the signature.
        privateKey - if null request payload signature will not be generated. The private key will NOT be serialized in the request.

      • SamlTokenSecurityContext

        public SamlTokenSecurityContext(com.vmware.vapi.saml.SamlToken token)
        Internal. This constructor is used to transfer request authentication data to the service implementation.
        Parameters:
        token - cannot be null.
